lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN AUSTRALIA, Thursday, July 1 (AP) -- Supporting the Allied landing operations, Flying Fortresses and Liberators of Lieut. Gen. George C. Kenney's Fifth Air Force pounded the Japanese airfields at Rabaul, New Britain, in five separate sorties through the night of June 29 and the morning of the 30th while strong units of Mitchell medium bombers blasted enemy installations around Salamaua, it was announced here today.
abstract: Allied bomber attacks 3 Jap cargo ships, Dampier Strait
